Text: Energy shot:  Whereas most energy drinks are sold in cans or bottles, energy shots are usually sold in 50ml bottles.

Text: Energy shot:  Energy shots can contain the same total amount of caffeine, vitamins or other functional ingredients as their larger versions, and may be considered concentrated forms of energy drinks.

Text: Energy shot:  "Micro shot" energy drinks also exist, containing only 1-5 teaspoons of liquid.
